gui.config.comment.title: 目前版本 -> %1$s （示意 v%2$s）
gui.config.comment.title.biome_messages:
自定義生態域訊息
 （手動格式：biome_name;訊息）
 可用的占位符：
 - &biome& = 生態域名稱
gui.config.comment.title.dimension_messa:
自定義維度訊息
 （手動格式： dimension_name;訊息）
 可用的占位符：
 - &dimension& = 維度名稱
 - &icon& =預設維度圖示
gui.config.comment.title.server_messages:
自定義伺服器訊息
 （手動格式： server_Address;訊息;圖示）
 可用的占位符：
 - &ip& =  伺服器位址
 - &name& = 伺服器名稱
 - &motd& = 伺服器Motd
 - &icon& = 預設伺服器圖示
 - &players& = 伺服器玩家統計
 - &playerinfo& = 您在世界中的玩家資訊消息
 - &worldinfo& = 您在世界中遊戲資訊
gui.config.comment.title.status_messages: 客製化與不同遊戲狀態有關的資訊
gui.config.comment.title.accessibility: 自訂模組的可存取性設定 （包括： - Language Id （語言ID） - Keybinds （快捷鍵） - 額外的介面客製化選項 （額外的介面自訂選項）。
gui.config.comment.presence_settings: 自訂中Discord豐富狀態資訊的格式和位置
gui.config.message.editor.value.name: 值名稱：
gui.config.message.presence.generalArgs:
一般的消息格式化參數。 
占位符可在狀態資訊和其他區域設定有些占位符是空的，除非它們被指定 
&MAINMENU& = 主選單資訊，當在主選單中時 - &MCVERSION& = Minecraft版本標籤  - &BRAND& = Minecraft品牌標籤 - &IGN& = 非世界玩家資訊資訊 - &MODS& = 顯示你模組數量的資訊 - &PACK& = 如果有使用資料包/材質包，會是資料包/材質包的資訊。
 - &DIMENSION& = 目前的維度訊息
 - &BIOME& = 目前的生態域訊息
 - &SERVER& = 目前的伺服器訊息
 - &SCREEN& = 目前的介面訊息
 &TILEENTITY& = 目前實體所拿取的訊息(方塊/物品/盔甲)
 - &TARGETENTITY& = 目前的實體標籤訊息
 - &ATTACKINGENTITY& = 目前攻擊中的實體訊息
 - &RIDINGENTITY& = 目前騎乘的實體訊息
gui.config.message.presence.iconArgs:
一般的圖示格式化參數。 
在狀態資訊和其他區域可設定的占位符
* 一些占位符是空的，除非它們被指定
 - &DEFAULT& = 預設圖示，在設定中指定 - &MAINMENU& = 在主選單中使用的圖示
 *使用這個代替 &DEFAULT& 來只在主選單中顯示預設圖示
 - &PACK& = 材質包/資料包的圖示，如果有使用材質包
資料包的情況下
 - &DIMENSION& = 目前維度圖示
 - &SERVER& = 目前伺服器圖示
gui.config.message.character.notice: 同步注意事項\n\n 在舊版 Minecraft 上同步可能無法產生準確的結果
gui.config.message.credits:
這個設定介面由Jonathing從頭開始製作
並持續維護此模組到現在
，製作此自訂介面做了很多努力

。希望能讓他得到一些支持。
，讓他持續維護這個模組，此模組的原始碼放在GitLab儲存庫。
gui.config.message.null: 這個區域還沒有實現！\n\n請稍後再來檢查。
gui.config.message.empty.list: 此列表為空，無法顯示!\n\n 請重試看看...
gui.config.message.hover.access: **啟用 「%1$s」 並儲存您的設定以使用此選單**。
gui.config.message.hover.empty.default: **預設資訊不能為空，必須是有效的**。
gui.config.message.hover.value.name: 識別此值的名稱
gui.config.comment.button.sync.config: 同步從 craftpresence.properties/nWarning 所做的任何即時變更。\n如果沒有儲存，這將會覆蓋在這裡所做的任何修改!
gui.config.comment.general.client_id: 用戶ID用於檢索資源、圖示鍵和標題
gui.config.comment.general.default_icon: 預設圖示\n (用於主選單、維度及伺服器)
gui.config.comment.general.detect_curse_: 啟用對 Twitch/Curse 清單數據的檢測？
gui.config.comment.general.detect_multim: 啟用對 MultiMC 實例數據的檢測？
gui.config.comment.general.detect_mcupda: 啟用對 MCUpdater 實例數據的檢測？
gui.config.comment.general.detect_techni: 啟用對技術包數據的檢測？
gui.config.comment.general.show_time: Show elapsed time in Rich Presence?
gui.config.comment.general.detect_biome_: Enable detection of biome data?\n (Allows usage of Biome Messages and associated placeholders)
gui.config.comment.general.detect_dimens: Enable detection of dimension data?\n (Allows usage of Dimension Messages and associated placeholders)
gui.config.comment.general.detect_world_: Enable detection of Server/SinglePlayer world data?\n (Allows usage of Server Messages and associated placeholders)
gui.config.comment.general.enable_join_r: Allow sending/receiving join requests in Discord?
gui.config.comment.general.party_privacy: Party Privacy Level\n (Applies when Join Requests are enabled)
gui.config.comment.general.reset_time_on: Whether or not to reset the Starting Timestamp when the RPC is rebooted
gui.config.comment.general.auto_register: Whether or not to register this Client as an application with discord\n (Warning: Can have compatibility and JVM Issues)
gui.config.comment.biome_messages.biome_: 在不支援或未知生態域中，使用預設生態域圖示

自定義生態域訊息
 (手動格式： biome_name;訊息;圖示)
 可用的占位符：
 - &biome& = 生態域名稱
 - &icon& =預設生態域圖示
gui.config.comment.dimension_messages.di: 在不支援或未知維度中，使用預設維度圖示

自定義維度訊息
 (手動格式： dimension_name;訊息;圖示)
可用的占位符：
 - &dimension& = 維度名稱
 - &icon& =預設維度圖示
gui.config.comment.server_messages.serve: 在不支援伺服器中，使用預設伺服器圖示
Server Motd to default to, in the case of a null Motd\n (Also applies for direct connects)
Server display name to default to, in the case of a null name\n (Also applies for direct connects)

自定義伺服器訊息
 （手動格式： server_Address;訊息;圖示）
 可用的占位符：
 - &ip& =  伺服器位址
 - &name& = 伺服器名稱
 - &motd& = 伺服器Motd
 - &icon& = 預設伺服器圖示
 - &players& = 伺服器玩家統計
 - &playerinfo& = 您在世界中的玩家資訊消息
 - &worldinfo& = 您在世界中遊戲資訊
gui.config.comment.status_messages.loadi: 在載入狀態時顯示訊息\n (在 RPC 初始化和第一次刷新之間)
gui.config.comment.status_messages.lan_m:
自定義區域遊戲訊息
 可用的占位符:
 - &ip& = 伺服器位址
 - &name& = 伺服器名稱
 - &motd& = 伺服器Motd
 - &icon& = 預設伺服器圖示
 - &players& = 伺服器玩家統計
 - &playerinfo& = 您在世界中的玩家資訊消息
 - &worldinfo& = 您在世界中遊戲資訊
gui.config.comment.status_messages.singl:
Message to display while in Singleplayer
 Available placeholders:
 - &playerinfo& = Your in-world player info message
 - &worldinfo& = Your in-world game info
gui.config.comment.status_messages.place:
Message to use for the &pack& placeholder in Presence settings
 (If a Curse, Twitch, Technic, MCUpdater, or MultiMC Pack is detected)
 Available placeholders:
 - &name& = The pack's name
Message to use for the &ign& general placeholder in Presence settings and the &playerinfo& placeholder in server settings\n Available placeholders:\n - &name& = Your username

Message to use for the &playerinfo& placeholder in server settings
 Available placeholders:
 - &coords& = The player's coordinate placeholder message
 - &health& = The player's health placeholder message

Message to use for the &coords& argument for the &playerinfo& placeholder in server settings
 Available placeholders:
 - &xPosition& = Your current in-game X position
 - &yPosition& = Your current in-game Y position
 - &zPosition& = Your current in-game Z position

Message to use for the &health& argument for the &playerinfo& placeholder in server settings
 Available placeholders:
 - &current& = Your current in-game health
 - &max& = Your current in-game maximum health

Message to use for the &players& placeholder in server settings
 Available placeholders:
 - &current& = Current player count
 - &max& = Maximum player count

Message to use for the &tileentity& general placeholder from Presence settings
 Available placeholders:
 - &main& = Current main hand item
 - &offhand& = Current offhand item
 - &helmet& = Currently equipped helmet
 - &chest& = Currently equipped chestpiece
 - &legs& = Currently equipped leggings
 - &boots& = Currently equipped boots

Message to use for the &worldinfo& placeholder in server settings
 Available placeholders:
 - &difficulty& = The current world's difficulty
 - &worldname& = The name of the current world
 - &worldtime& = The current world's in-game time
Message to use for the &mods& placeholder in Presence settings\n Available placeholders:\n - &modcount& = The amount of mods currently in your mods folder
gui.config.comment.status_messages.speci: Message to display in Rich Presence when using Vivecraft
gui.config.comment.status_messages.fallb: If not empty, this text will be used for the &pack& placeholder if no packs are detected
gui.config.comment.advanced.split_charac: The split character for the arrays in CraftPresence's messages configs
gui.config.comment.advanced.refresh_rate: The time to take in between refreshing the Rich Presence display and modules, in seconds
gui.config.comment.advanced.round_size: The amount to round certain variables within the Rich Presence display, as an Integer
gui.config.comment.advanced.include_extr: Whether or not to allow the Per-Gui System to scan additional classes\n (Warning: Can cause compatibility issues with other mods)
gui.config.comment.advanced.enable_comma: Allows CraftPresence to utilize commands\n (Enables Command Gui in main Config Gui)
gui.config.comment.advanced.enable_per_g:
Allows CraftPresence to change it's display based on the Gui you're in
 Note the following:
 - Requires an option in Gui messages
 - Minecraft's Guis must be opened once before configuring due to obfuscation
gui.config.comment.advanced.enable_per_i: Allows CraftPresence to change it's display based on the item you're holding\n Note the following:\n - Requires an option in item messages
gui.config.comment.advanced.enable_per_e: Allows CraftPresence to change its display based on entity data\n Note the following:\n - Requires an option in a valid entity message list
gui.config.comment.advanced.render_toolt: Allow CraftPresence to render hover tooltips (when available)
gui.config.comment.advanced.format_words: Toggles automatic capitalizing of words and general formatting with strings
gui.config.comment.advanced.debug_mode: Toggles Developer Mode, showing debug features and enabling debug logging\n\nOverridden Status -> %1$s
gui.config.comment.advanced.verbose_mode: Toggles Verbose Mode, showing more detailed logging as well as stack traces and deeper exception messages\n\nOverriden Status -> %1$s
gui.config.comment.advanced.gui_messages:
Customize messages to display with Guis
 (Manual format: gui;message)
 Available placeholders:
 - &screen& = Gui Screen name
 - &class& = Gui class name
gui.config.comment.advanced.item_message:
Customize messages to display with items
 (Manual format: item;message)
 Available placeholders:
 - &item& = Item name

 %1$s
gui.config.comment.advanced.entity_targe:
Customize messages to display when pointing at an entity
 (Manual format: entity;message)
 Available placeholders:
 - &entity& = Entity name (or player Uuid)

 %1$s
gui.config.comment.advanced.entity_attac:
Customize messages to display when attacking an entity
 (Manual format: entity;message)
 Available placeholders:
 - &entity& = Entity name (or player Uuid)

 %1$s
gui.config.comment.advanced.entity_ridin:
Customize messages to display when riding an entity
 (Manual format: entity;message)
 Available placeholders:
 - &entity& = Entity name (or player Uuid)

 %1$s
gui.config.comment.accessibility.tooltip: The color or texture to be used when rendering CraftPresence tooltip backgrounds
The color or texture to be used when rendering CraftPresence tooltip borders
gui.config.comment.accessibility.gui_bac: The color or texture to be used when rendering CraftPresence Gui backgrounds
gui.config.comment.accessibility.button_: The color or texture to be used when rendering CraftPresence Button backgrounds
gui.config.comment.accessibility.languag: The locale or language identifier to be used for translating this mod's strings
gui.config.comment.accessibility.show_ba: Show background colors (Non Rgba) with a darker tint, like vanilla minecraft
gui.config.comment.accessibility.strip_t: Allows CraftPresence to remove color and formatting codes from it's translations
gui.config.comment.accessibility.show_lo: Allows CraftPresence to display it's logging in the chat hud
gui.config.comment.accessibility.strip_e: Allows CraftPresence to remove excess visual improvements from the Gui\n (Can improve gui performance in some areas)
key.craftpresence.config_keycode.name: Config Gui Keybind
key.craftpresence.config_keycode.descrip: The keybind to access the config screen
craftpresence.message.unsupported: This feature is not supported in this version of Minecraft
craftpresence.command.usage.main:
§l工藝的存在 - 子指令:
 §r指令格式: §6/<cp|craftpresence> <command>

 §6§lreboot §r- 重啟本模組(RPC)
 §6§lshutdown §r- 關閉本模組(RPC)
 §6§lreload §r- 根據設定重新載入工藝的存在的資料
 §6§lrequest §r- 查看請求加入功能的資訊
 §6§lexport §r- 查看用於模組數據的export指令
 §6§lview §r- 查看多種顯示數據
 §6§lhelp §r- 查看本頁面
craftpresence.command.usage.view:
§l工藝的存在 - 查看子指令:

 §6§lcurrentData §r- 以文字形式顯示您當前的 RPC 數據
 §6§lassets §r- 顯示所有可用的資源圖示
 §6§ldimensions §r- D顯示可用的維度名稱
 §6§lbiomes §r- 顯示可用的生態域名稱
 §6§lservers §r- 顯示可用的伺服器位置
 §6§lscreens §r- 顯示可用的介面名稱
 §6§litems §r- 顯示可用的物品名稱
 §6§lentities §r- 顯示可用的實體名稱
craftpresence.command.usage.view.assets:
§l工藝的存在 - 查看資源子指令:

 §6§llarge §r- 查看大小為 大型的 Discord資源
 §6§lsmall §r- 查看大小為 小型的 Discord資源
 §6§lall §r- 查看所有 Discord資源
craftpresence.command.usage.export: §l工藝的存在 - 匯出子指令:\n\n §6§lassets [clientId::%1$s] [doFullCopy::%2$s] §r- 以文字或資源形式從指定的用戶 ID 導出資源
craftpresence.command.export.pre: §6§l開始從用戶端 ID %2$s 匯出 %1$s 資源，完整複製狀態為 %3$s
craftpresence.command.export.post: §2§l完成用戶端 ID %2$s 匯出 %1$s 資源，完整複製狀態為 %3$s
craftpresence.command.export.exception: §c§l指令異常 - 無法從用戶端 ID %1$s 匯出資源
craftpresence.command.current_data:
§lCurrent RPC Data (Logged in as %1$s):§r
 §6§lDetails:§r %2$s
 §6§lGame State:§r %3$s
 §6§lStart Timestamp:§r %4$s
 §6§lClient ID:§r %5$s
 §6§lLarge Icon Key:§r %6$s
 §6§lLarge Icon Text:§r %7$s
 §6§lSmall Icon Key:§r %8$s
 §6§lSmall Icon Text:§r %9$s
 §6§lParty ID:§r %10$s
 §6§lParty Size:§r %11$s
 §6§lParty Max:§r %12$s
 §6§lParty Privacy:§r %13$s
 §6§lJoin Secret:§r %14$s
 §6§lEnd Timestamp:§r %15$s
 §6§lMatch Secret:§r %16$s
 §6§lSpectate Secret:§r %17$s
 §6§lInstance:§r %18$s
craftpresence.command.request.info:
§6§lRequest Info:§r
 §6§lRequester Username: %1$s

 §6§lUse /cp request <accept|deny> or wait %2$s seconds to ignore
craftpresence.command.request.none: §6§lYou do not have any available join requests!
craftpresence.command.request.accept: §6§lJoin request accepted! %1$s has been sent an invite!
craftpresence.command.shutdown.post: §2§lCraftPresence has been shutdown!\n §6§lUse /cp reboot to reboot

craftpresence.logger.error.file.mcupdate: Unable to get MCUpdater instance data (ignore if not using a MCUpdater Pack)
